item.title: 知情人士透露，LVMH 集团正在考虑收购马克-雅各布斯（Marc Jacobs）的可能性
item.description: 据知情人士透露，路威酩轩轩尼诗-路易威登集团（LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SE）正在为其旗下的马克-雅各布斯（Marc Jacobs）时装品牌寻找潜在买家。【原文：LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SE is exploring options for its Marc Jacobs fashion brand amid interest from potential buyers, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 杰罗姆-鲍威尔 "一开口"，美联储的下行风险就开始了
item.description:
他可能希望保持沉默，但说什么最终都会向市场发出信号

。【原文：

He may want to be boring, but saying anything still ends up sending a signal to markets

item.title: 下行风险增加，澳大利亚房价进一步攀升
item.description: 在借贷成本创下 12 年新高之际，供应短缺加剧了经济承受能力方面的挑战，受此推动，澳大利亚房地产市场在 4 月份进一步攀升。【原文：Australia’s housing market climbed further in April, driven by a supply shortfall that’s increasing affordability challenges at a time when borrowing costs are at a 12-year high.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称通胀数据让欧洲央行有信心在 6 月降息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，4月份的欧元区通胀数据让欧洲央行有信心在6月份开始降息，然后继续以务实的步伐放宽货币政策。【原文：Euro-area inflation data for April give the European Central Bank confidence to begin cutting interest rates in June before continuing to loosen monetary policy at a pragmatic pace, Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: 随着日元汇率飙升，芝加哥商品交易所迎来 2016 年以来日元交易最繁忙的一天
item.description: 据全球最大的受监管货币市场CME集团称，周一是自2016年11月以来日元现货交易最繁忙的一天。【原文：Monday was the busiest day for spot trading in the Japanese yen since November 2016, according to CME Group, the world’s largest regulated currency marketplace.】

item.title: 迪拜酋长的公司再融资 82 亿美元，发掘房地产市场繁荣潜力
item.description: 迪拜控股公司（Dubai Holding）再融资 300 亿迪拉姆（约合 82 亿美元）贷款，用于替换上个月吞并的两家国家支持的开发商的老旧设施，从而更好地利用该市房地产市场的繁荣。【原文：Dubai Holding refinanced a 30 billion dirham ($8.2 billion) loan to replace older facilities at the two state-backed developers it absorbed last month, better positioning itself to capitalize on a boom in the city’s real estate market.】

item.title: 随着 ETF 需求降温，比特币面临自 FTX 崩溃以来最糟糕的一个月
item.description: 随着美国交易所交易基金对最大数字资产的狂热逐渐消退，比特币创下了山姆-班克曼-弗里德的 FTX 帝国崩溃以来最糟糕的一个月。【原文：Bitcoin is registering its worst month since the collapse of Sam Bankman-Fried’s FTX empire as the euphoria around US exchange-traded funds for the largest digital asset subsides.】

item.title: 据说巴林将为沙特重要石油管道寻找投资者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴林正在为一条从沙特阿拉伯输送原油的重要石油管道寻找投资者，因为这个海湾地区最小的经济体正在寻求能源资产的货币化。【原文：Bahrain is scouting for investors in a key oil pipeline that transports crude from Saudi Arabia, according to people familiar with the matter, as the Gulf’s smallest economy looks to monetize energy assets.】

item.title: 霍尔茨曼告诉普拉托，欧洲央行不应在 6 月和 7 月同时降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）在接受 Platow Brief 采访时表示，欧洲中央银行应避免在 6 月和 7 月连续降息。【原文：The European Central Bank should refrain from back-to-back interest rate cuts in June and July, Governing Council member Robert Holzmann told Platow Brief in an interview.】

item.title: 北京进一步放宽非核心区域购房限制
item.description: 中国首都北京将允许家庭在非核心区域多购买一套住房，因为即使是中国最大的城市也在创纪录的房地产低迷压力下举步维艰。【原文：China’s capital city Beijing will allow families to buy one more home in non-core areas, as even the nation’s largest cities are buckling under the pressure of a record real estate downturn.】

item.title: 万科将退出非核心业务，剥离资产以实现资金周转
item.description: 根据周二股东大会的一份备忘录，中国万科股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：China Vanke Co. will exit non-core operations and divest assets as the developer seeks to boost liquidity amid the sector’s unprecedented downturn, according to a memo from a shareholder meeting on Tuesday.】

item.title: 通胀乏力，商品 ETF 自 2022 年以来吸纳最多现金
item.description: 投资者将两年多来最多的资金投入到基础广泛的商品交易所交易基金中，因为他们押注通胀持续高企预示着对原材料的需求将持续强劲。【原文：Investors are putting the most money into broad-based commodity ETFs in more than two years, on bets that sticky inflation is signaling continued robust demand for raw materials.】

item.title: 奥尔斯特德和麦格理是澳大利亚海上风电首秀的首选公司之一
item.description: 澳大利亚政府批准了包括 Orsted AS 和麦格理资产管理公司 Corio Generation 在内的开发商进一步开展项目工作，旨在提供该国首个海上风电项目。【原文：Australia’s government approved further work on projects by developers including Orsted AS and Macquarie Asset Management’s Corio Generation aimed at delivering the country’s first offshore wind.】

item.title: 巴西失业率上升，央行准备降息
item.description: 巴西上个月的失业率增幅低于预期，这可能加剧了央行行长们对劳动力市场过热的担忧。【原文：Brazil’s jobless rate ticked up less than expected last month, likely adding to central bankers’ concerns that the labor market is running too hot.】

item.title: 七国集团承诺减少对俄罗斯的核依赖
item.description: 七国集团成员国已同意努力减少对俄罗斯 "民用核相关产品 "的依赖，主要工业化国家正在努力重新制定能源计划，同时孤立莫斯科。【原文：Nations from the Group of Seven have agreed to work to reduce their reliance on “civil nuclear-related goods” from Russia, as major industrialized nations work to reset their energy plans while isolating Moscow.】

item.title: Haleon 关闭英国工厂，将牙膏生产迁往斯洛伐克
item.description: 保健消费品巨头 Haleon Plc 计划关闭伦敦西部的一家工厂，这对英国制造业的雄心造成了打击。【原文：Consumer health giant Haleon Plc plans to close a factory to the west of London in a blow to Britain’s manufacturing ambitions.】

item.title: 肯尼亚洪灾死亡人数上升，预计将有更多暴雨
item.description: 肯尼亚的洪水和泥石流已造成 169 人死亡，随着厄尔尼诺气候条件造成的暴雨预计将继续侵袭东非，死亡人数预计还会上升。【原文：Floods and mudslides in Kenya have killed 169 people, and the toll is expected to rise with torrential downpours caused by El Niño weather conditions expected to keep pounding East Africa.】

item.title: ADM 因销量增加利润缩水幅度低于预期
item.description: 阿彻-丹尼尔斯-米德兰公司（Archer-Daniels-Midland Co.【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland Co.’s profit fell less than expected in the first quarter as an increase in the crop trader’s processed volumes helped partly offset lower pricing and margins.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"落伍者已提出补偿性减油计划
item.description: 欧佩克+"中承诺额外减产石油以弥补配额不足的落伍者们已经提出了实现减产的计划。【原文：The OPEC+ laggards who promised extra oil production cuts to make up for flouting quotas have presented plans for delivering them.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金认为30年稳定市场面临挑战
item.description: 挪威1.6万亿美元主权财富的首席执行官尼古拉-坦根（Nicolai Tangen）说，一个更加分裂的世界正在给市场带来地缘政治挑战，而这是挪威以前从未遇到过的。【原文：A more divided world is posing geopolitical challenges for markets that Norway’s $1.6 trillion sovereign wealth hasn’t previously witnessed, Chief Executive Officer Nicolai Tangen said.】

item.title: 高盛和法国兴业银行认为莫迪连任可能给卢比带来收益
item.description: 从高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）到法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）的策略师都预计，如果印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）在大选中赢得第三个任期，印度卢比将受到提振。【原文：Strategists from Goldman Sachs Group Inc. to Societe Generale SA are expecting the Indian rupee to get a boost should Prime Minister Narendra Modi win a third term in elections.】

item.title: 中国房屋销售持续下滑，高官承诺提供支持
item.description: 中国 4 月份的房屋销售继续下滑，这凸显了高层决策者加大力度重振市场的原因。【原文：China’s home sales continued to fall in April, underscoring why top policymakers are stepping up efforts to revive the market.】

item.title: 西班牙银行逆势而上，桑坦德银行和 BBVA 银行从利率中获益
item.description: 西班牙最大的银行报告了有史以来最高的收入，因为它们继续从高利率中获益，一反一些欧洲同行贷款收入开始下降的趋势。【原文：Spain’s largest banks reported the highest revenue ever as they continue to reap the benefits from high interest rates, defying a trend among some European peers that have seen lending income start to decline.】

item.description: Enel SpA 公司在未达到排放目标后，将面临支付全球最大的可持续发展相关贷款的更高利率。【原文：Enel SpA faces paying higher rates on the world’s largest sustainability-linked loan after missing an emissions target.】

item.title: 新加坡监管机构终止对星展银行为期六个月的数字银行处罚
item.description: 新加坡最大的贷款机构星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）改进了其数字银行服务中的一系列缺陷，新加坡金融监管机构将结束为期六个月的禁令，该禁令限制星展集团控股有限公司从事非必要的活动。【原文：Singapore’s financial regulator is ending a six-month ban that restricted DBS Group Holdings Ltd. from non-essential activities, after the country’s largest lender improved weaknesses related to a series of glitches in its digital banking services.】

item.title: UnitedHealth 股票销售促使立法者要求美国证券交易委员会进行调查
item.description: 以马萨诸塞州参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）为首的美国民主党议员要求美国证券交易委员会调查联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：Democratic US lawmakers led by Massachusetts Senator Elizabeth Warren are asking the Securities and Exchange Commission to investigate the timing of stock sales by UnitedHealth Group Inc.’s chairman and three executives.】

item.title: 调查显示，英美资源集团收购价需超过每股 30 英镑
item.description: 据彭博社调查的分析师和交易商称，对英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的收购价格需要超过每股30英镑（37.6美元），这一价格高于必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd.）上周的报价。【原文：A takeover of Anglo American Plc would need to be pitched at more than £30 ($37.6) per share, a higher price than BHP Group Ltd. offered last week, according to analysts and traders surveyed by Bloomberg.】
